title: Casual Silver 3 Support main looking for a few people to play games with
body:
Hey all,

Just a silver 3 support main, I have a preference towards tanky supports like Braum and Gragas but can also play Zyra and Soraka.  Still building out my support options.

Anyway, just looking for others of similar skill to play some games with. I would prefer to talk over voice chat if we play but will take what i can get.
In game name is Tribalmind, add me or put your name here and i'll add you

replies.body:
Hi

I'm part of a clan that that has a NA team but I am trying to get a OCE one up and running, if you are interested feel free to come on to TS and have a chat and we can go from there.
TS Server:
ts.dmg-inc.com
